headline: Gartner Set to Report Q2 Earnings: Here's What You Should Know
summary: IT is expected to post second-quarter 2025 revenues of $1.7B and EPS of $3.37, fueled by strong segment growth and cost control.

headline: Centric PLM Named a Representative Vendor in Gartner's 2025 Market Guide for PLM in Food & Beverage Industries
summary: Centric Software® is proud to announce that Centric PLM™ for food & beverage has been named a representative vendor in Gartner's '2025 Market Guide for PLM in Food and Beverage Industries.' Centric Software provides the most innovative enterprise solutions to design, develop, formulate, source, comply, buy, make, package, market and sell consumer goods products in food & beverage, grocery and multi-category retail to achieve strategic and operational digital transformation goals.
